headline: Adobe Stock Looks Like a Huge AI Bargain After a Nosedive. Should You Buy?
summary: Adobe (NASDAQ:ADBE) stock looks on track to revisit multi-year lows following the latest AI-driven scare that’s worked its way through the software scene. Undoubtedly, the software stocks, especially Adobe, have been gravitating lower for well over a year now, but something certainly feels different about the latest shocker, which likely has something to do with ... Adobe Stock Looks Like a Huge AI Bargain After a Nosedive. Should You Buy?

headline: AI & Business Newsletter |Will AI Really Kill Software?
summary: Imagine being a CEO who can simply tell an AI bot how to handle your company’s human-resource, sales, customer tracking and other back-office functions.  Would you still pay a software vendor millions of dollars a year for those services?  The tool is designed to make it easier for workers who aren’t software engineers to use the company’s Claude Code chatbot to automate work functions, like reviewing emails and organizing computer files.

headline: Has AI Killed Adobe For Good?
summary: Adobe's stock faces AI headwinds but shows signs of undervaluation and potential recovery through business evolution, with analysts still bullish on its prospects.
